press the left one first, wait for a moment until the upper bar fills a little, then press the middle one, wait for the second bar to fill, and finish off by pressing the last button Alternatively, roll into a ball, and lay one bomb in the middle of the last solid square, then tap left    Artifact 55: Matchbook Head up to the attic to find a matchbook that has a safe combination written in it Once these monsters are dead there will be nothing else stopping you from destroying the first heart Head up once that's done  Talk to Iron Wolf Jarulf Once you've won the battle initiate a conversation with the leader of this group -Jarulf Iron Wolf  This room has three Stalfos, one of which holds a key There's a bench here if you want to craft any upgrades Let yourself fall down to an area below with many green buttons Before going on ahead, turn around and break the blocks behind you to reveal yet another CROWN You learn more about their family  relationship This is a great vantage point to take them out with flower power, but if you don't have it you'll have to wait for a break Approach the gates of a town named New Tristram  7 Walk behind the turret to the next glass window Find a crater and descend, heading towards Cathedral Level 1 Notice new plasmids in there: Electro Bolt 3, Wrench Lurker 2, Cyclone Trap 2 Ellie comes to save the day, so mash Triangle again Rewind time and you will see on the ground a flaming trail of gasoline Speak with Tyrael to begin this new mission AUDIO DIARY: [Gatherer's Vulnerability] - Again, head up a screen A little after the beginning, after the loop and the springs, you'll jump up and see the zip line Pacifist Boss Tips: Memoryhead The first key to find is the Red Key, and is located to the west  Start exploring the Keep Depths Level 1 Thankfully the boss is slow and uses knockback instead of serious blows Continue forward until you reach the place at which the new foe is standing still Go through the truck and get ambushed  Do these twelve times with twelve chickens, and you have already earned yourself  a checkpoint, and a snapshot This will eventually take you to the warp room, essential for speed runs    Burrow (Knuckles) Press and hold X to burrow under special surfaces  Once done, head over to the plant and go up the stairs and use a shiv to get through the door After three rounds, he will be defeated and you will be brought to the next level  Get back to the corridor and enter the room of "Catherine Chun   Move them into their exits and complete the level Now you'll need to jump into the chasm to die and start over at the beginning of the split if you want to get the other collectible There are a few new things to be bought: Hacking Expert 2, Incinerate 2, Winter Blast 2, Insect Swarm 2 Watch as Bill empties one of his traps, then head outside to the street Place a bomb right before where the wall juts out Again, there is nothing major to interact with here, so be as diligent as you want with your investigations Then break the grate in the left wall to find a CROWN    Back in the hub world, you can now complete a new sidequest Don't fight the Splicers he summons from time to time - do not kill anything!
